subject: Swimming
Death and Dying
lead_paragraph: Fran Crippen died last weekend during a World Cup race in the Middle East, a horrifying and — according to his family and friends — entirely preventable event involving a still-emerging sport.
snippet: Fran Crippen died last weekend during a World Cup race in the Middle East, a horrifying and — according to his family and friends — entirely preventable event involving a still-emerging sport.
